---
title: "Works"
---

I love to create informative and imaginative data visualizations in my tools of choice: Tableau and R. Below are a few selected visualizations--you can view more at the [California Teachers Study Tableau Public page](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/california.teachers.study/) and the [Viz of the Month blog series](https://www.calteachersstudy.org/blog/categories/viz-of-the-month), the goal of which is to provide researchers example code and instructions to implement visualizations in R.
